/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a 360-degree panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of depth and scale to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves forming a natural canopy over the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades bathed in the warm glow of the sun. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
